Title: No Retreat, No Surrender
Writer: See-Yuen Ng (original story), Corey Yuen (original story), Keith W. Strandberg (screenplay)
Actors: Kurt McKinney, Jean-Claude Van Damme, J.W. Fails, Kathie Sileno
Plot: Jason, a Bruce Lee fan, sees his karate instructor/dad beaten by martial art thugs. They move to Seattle where, after humiliations, he trains with Bruce Lee's ghost so he can defend himself and others against thugs.
